reviewText: this is so good. i love the actors and everything about the movie. The movie has become one of my favorite movie. It has brought my love for my heritage back.

I bought this movie so I can show it to my students. I teach Italian in High School. I am going to create a lesson out of it describing characters and places.
It's a good movie, not too violent, or too much sex. Pretty clean and a realist movie where students can identify themselves.

Great story too. Students are going to be so surprised about the end of the movie.

The product was delivers in perfect condition and on time.

Typo Romeo and Juliet **
Makes you remember when you were first crazy in love and you couldn't get enough or stop at anything to be together:)

He's yummy and makes the movie!
Pretty good movie, 100% Italian, the only downside is that NOT has subtitles in Spanish.
